nodes.documentation: @dev Throws if called by any account other than the functionalOwner.
nodes.name: onlyFunctionalOwner

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns true if the caller is the current functionalOwner.
nodes.name: isFunctionalOwner

nodes.documentation:
@dev Leaves the contract without functionalOwner. It will not be possible to call
`onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current functionalOwner.
     * NOTE: Renouncing functionalOwnership will leave the contract without an functionalOwner,
thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the functionalOwner.

nodes.name: claimFunctionalOwnership

devdoc.details: Extension for the Ownable contract, where the ownership needs to be claimed. This allows the new owner to accept the transfer.

claimFunctionalOwnership().details: Allows the pendingFunctionalOwner address to finalize the transfer.

constructor.details: Initializes the contract setting the deployer as the initial functionalFunctionalOwner.

functionalOwner().details: Returns the address of the current functionalOwner.

isFunctionalOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current functionalOwner.

renounceFunctionalOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without functionalOwner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current functionalOwner.     * NOTE: Renouncing functionalOwnership will leave the contract without an functionalOwner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the functionalOwner.

transferFunctionalOwnership(address).details: Allows the current functionalOwner to set the pendingOwner address.

params.newFunctionalOwner: The address to transfer functionalOwnership to.

devdoc.title: Claimable
